tool.name: adjust seq orientation
tool.description: Get the reverse complement of all sequences

param.label: -i/--input_fasta_fp: path to the input fasta file
param.name: input_fasta_fp

param.label: -r/--retain_seq_id: leave seq description lines untouched [default: append " RC" to seq description lines]
param.name: retain_seq_id

tool.help: Write the reverse complement of all seqs in seqs.fasta (-i) to seqs_rc.fasta (default, change output_fp with -o). Each sequence description line will have ' RC' appended to the end of it (default, leave sequence description lines untouched by passing -r):
